alert.note: Alert for Adams; Billings; Bowman; Golden Valley; Hettinger; Slope; Stark (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 11 at 12:15PM CST until March 12 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Much of southwest North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 11 PM MST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 PM MST this evening to 9 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility, and make travel difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Even though the snow may have ended, the strong winds will continue to bring ground blizzard conditions through this evening, with areas of blowing snow continuing overnight.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
